scripts.deploy-patch: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: pre-release commit' && npm version patch -m 'chore: bump version to %s' && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.deploy-minor: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: pre-release commit' && npm version minor -m 'chore: bump version to %s' && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
